BUSINESS INTRODUCTION
Majid Al Futtaim Retail is the leading shopping mall, retail, communities, entertainment developer and operator in the Middle East, North Africa, and Central Asia regions. With over 48,000 people, revenues of over US$ 11 Billion, and operations in 18 countries. Some of the iconic brands we carry include Mall of the Emirates, Carrefour, All Saints, Lego, City Center, Abercrombie & Fitch, & Vox Cinemas. We believe in making Great Moments for Everyone, Every day.JOB TITLE
Innovation Chef | MAF Retail | Hypermarket UAE

ROLE SUMMARY
The Innovation Chef is responsible for supporting the development management team on the development of new products and ranges and take full accountability of the documentation from concept to launch.

ROLE PROFILEDevelop food concepts in line with customer feedback/needs, business plan and agreed upon critical path.
Take full accountability of recipe creation and documentation at product level including packaging.
Prepare samples for transit trials and travel tests for all dishes.
Monitor concept costs and ensure they adhere to agreed margins & targets. Ensure all costings are updated at each stage of development up to launch.
Work closely with procurement & technical teams to ensure all new raw materials meet agreed specifications & parameters. Communicate with B2B once samples are approved so that they can be created.
Liaise with Operations Manager to draft proposed labor for all projects.
Assist Operations Manager with product routing.
Complete “Raw material/ Recipe change” forms for any changes to recipes or ingredients and ensure these are approved in line with internal procedures.REQUIREMENTSFormal culinary qualification or 5+ years’ experience in premium restaurants/ hotels.
Previous 2 years food manufacturing experience in the UK, US or Europe (desirable)
Chilled food manufacturing or high volume catering experience (essential)
Experience in Food manufacturing is a must.
Fluent communication skills in English (writing and speaking)
Up-to-date with food and beverage trends and best practices.WHAT WE OFFERAt Majid Al Futtaim, we’re on a mission to create great moments, to spread happiness, to build, experiences that stay in our memories for a lifetime. We’re proud to say that over the past 27 years, we have built a reputation as a regional market leader in what we do. Join us!
Work from any country in the world for 30 days a year.
Work in a friendly environment, where everyone shares positive vibes and excited about our future.
Work with over 50,000 diverse and talented colleagues, all guided by our Leadership Model.Job Details
